reporting_cycle: Secretary-General reports within 5 months; States cooperating with TFG to report within 3 months
summary:
11. Calls on States to cooperate in determining jurisdiction and prosecuting persons responsible for piracy and armed robbery.

12. Requests States cooperating with the TFG to report to the Security Council within 3 months on their actions.

13. Requests the Secretary-General to report to the Security Council within 5 months on the implementation of this resolution.

14. Requests the IMO Secretary-General to brief the Council on the situation with respect to piracy.

15. Expresses intention to review the situation and consider renewing the authority provided.

16. Decides to remain seized of the matter.
